name: Gentner Lab Repos
body:
![Gentner Lab](http://gentnerlab.ucsd.edu/images/gentnerlab_logo5.png)

http://gentnerlab.ucsd.edu

# Public Repositories

## PyOperant

A Python package for easily constructing and sharing operant behavior paradigms.

http://gentnerlab.github.io/pyoperant

by Justin Kiggins & Marvin Thielk

## probe-the-broab

Spike2 scripts used for awake-behaving neural recordings

https://github.com/gentnerlab/probe-the-broab

by Dan Knudsen 

## django-broab

Django package that implements the Neo data model for neurophysiological data.

https://github.com/gentnerlab/django-broab

## sturnus

django database & website for experiment data

https://github.com/gentnerlab/sturnus

## operant_c

Legacy scripts for operant behavior

https://github.com/gentnerlab/operant_c
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
